text: Brickellia paniculata is a Mesoamerican species of flowering plants in the daisy family. It is widespread from Tamaulipas west to Sinaloa and south as far as Costa Rica.Turner, B. L. 1997. The Comps of Mexico: A systematic account of the family Asteraceae, vol. 1 – Eupatorieae. Phytologia Memoirs 11: i–iv, 1–272Nelson, C. H. 2008. Catálogo de las Plantas Vasculares de Honduras 1–1576.
